altTitles.en: 悪党2 悪魔の唇 宮坂香帆傑作集
放課後は恋の予感 宮坂香帆傑作集

description.en:
1) Houkago wa Koi no Yokan  
Sarara has been going out with her first boyfriend for over a week but they haven't progressed past going home from school together. Kawatori is a year younger, tall and cute, a little weird and quiet, but she knows that he's a very kind person, and loves his sweet smell. She adores sweets and cakes, and regularly visits her favourite cake shop, however Kawatori says that he doesn't even like cakes! With Christmas approaching and Kawatori saying that he's too busy to see her, is Sarara right in thinking that he's not really interested in her and is already cheating? What's he being so secretive about? Will they ever be able to have the sweet Christmas together of her dreams?  
  
2) Yuuwaku Danjon  
Natsumi has been by Ryo-kun's side for years and still hasn't confess her feellings. He's a year younger then her and tries to get in to Keisou University. When she brags about him to her friends everything goes wrong. Will they ever be together?  
  
3) Yozora ni Kiss  
Hitomi is the leader of the culture festival committee. Since she is transferring, she wants to do something special for the last time. Matsunaga-kun, the chairman, helps her with the planning. Hitomi has feelings for him, but she isn't brave enough to tell him. She sticks with making memories of him, but what happens when he doesn't want her to transfer…?  
  
4) Powder Snow ni Kiss  
  
5) Tokimeki no Private School  
  
  
ITALIANO  
Houkago wa Koi no Yokan  
  
La protagonista di questo one shot è una ragazza innamorata di Ondori Kuwatori… fino a quando decide dichiararsi e con sua grande sorpresa Ondori accetta di uscire con lei…E' il suo primo ragazzo e non sa mai come comportarsi in sua presenza,credendo di potere sembrare ai suoi occhi un tipo noioso. I loro incontri sono come quando non stavano insieme,non sono migliorati per niente… il loro rapporto non è proprio quello di una vera coppia,per questo è sommersa da molti dubbi… Oltretutto non può nemmeno regalargli dei dolci fatti da lei,perchè non gli piacciono. Avr� le risposte alle sue domande molto presto,in quanto si avvicina il Natale e se Ondori non far� niente di romantico in questo periodo dell'anno,significher� che per lui non è una persona che conta poi molto nella sua vita…
